question: Which among the following clearly defines the policy of Laissez Faire of British India?
option3: Curbing all restriction on import and export
option4: Settting up modern industries in India
answer: Curbing all restriction on import and export
explanation: The period of Laissez Faire started in 1813 and ended in 1860. Its main objective was curbing all restrictions on import and export between England and India.
